Texts.Chs: 所有关于^magenta;古代球^reset;的使用方法已经讲解完毕。 请通过最后的^orange;传送门^reset;退出本关。
Texts.Eng: All basics for the Ancient Sphere have been covered. Please exit through the ^orange;conveniently-placed teleporter^reset; at the end.

Texts.Chs: 首先，按^green;[F]^reset;激活你的^magenta;古代球^reset;。 默认的移动键为^orange;[W A S D]^reset;。 到达你上方的隧道以继续。
Texts.Eng: First, press ^green;[F]^reset; to activate your Ancient Sphere. Default movement keys are ^orange;[W A S D]^reset;. Reach the tunnel above you to proceed.

Texts.Chs: 按住^yellow;[Shift]^reset;以进入"绝对模式" - 任何动作在按住^yellow;[Shift]^reset;键时都将全速移动或者不动。
Texts.Eng: Hold ^yellow;[Shift]^reset; to enter "Absolute Mode" - Any and all movements while holding shift will either be moving at full speed or no movement at all.

Texts.Chs:
如果你要往下挖，我建议你继续但是务必小心。
^red;注意：你的下方有一个深不可测的断层。
Texts.Eng:
If you're going to dig to this area, I advise that you proceed to do so with caution.
^red;Please note that there is an extremely deep chasm below you.

Texts.Chs: 请注意，你刚刚进入一个古代球完全停止工作的区域，现在不要尝试使用古代球。
Texts.Eng: It should be noted that you just entered an area where your Ancient Sphere has completely stopped working. Do not attempt to use the Ancient Sphere at this moment.

Texts.Chs: 在你身上强行装备古代球本应该毫无价值。但是不要慌，跟着说明走。
Texts.Eng: It should be worth nothing that an Ancient Sphere has been forcibly equipped on your person. Please don't panic and follow the instructions.

Texts.Chs: 值得注意的是，这个世界一片混沌，你正在迅速成为这混沌虚空的一部分。如果没有^orange;暗物质EPP^reset;请勿尝试进一步探索。
Texts.Eng: It's worth noting that this world is very chaotic and you are quickly becoming part of this chaotic void. Do not attempt further exploration without a ^orange;Dark Matter EPP^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 请注意，这颗特殊星球上的空气使你腐烂。 我建议你在保护自己免受这种影响的情况下进行探索。^green;你可能需要治愈之水一类的东西。^reset;
Texts.Eng: Please note that the air on this particular planet is causing you to rot. I recommend that you explore this planet with protection against this effect. ^green;Possibly something that requires healing water.^reset;

Texts.Chs: 按住^green;[第二开火键]^reset;激活球体的射击功能，这是战斗和探索中的实用武器。
Texts.Eng: Press and hold ^green;[Alt Fire]^reset; to activate a globe-firing mechanism, a useful weapon in combat and exploration.

Texts.Chs: 按住^green;[开火键]^reset;激活能够破坏所有附近方块的挖掘力场。
Texts.Eng: Press and hold ^green;[Fire]^reset; to activate a mining field, which will destroy all nearby blocks.

Texts.Chs: 读数显示地下有异常现象。 我建议你谨慎探索。
Texts.Eng: Readings show an anomaly in the underground; I would advise you explore the area with caution.

Texts.Chs: 读数显示，一架巨大的类似无人机的飞行物潜伏在你下方的房间中。 最好带上自己最强的武器前去战斗。
Texts.Eng: Readings show that a massive, ship-like aircraft lurks in the chamber below you. It is best that you prepare yourself to fight it with your strongest weapons.

Texts.Chs: 扫描显示，这颗星球上的生命曾经蓬勃发展。 由于未知的原因，它现在是一片贫瘠的焦土荒地。
Texts.Eng: Scans show that life on this planet thrived. For unknown reasons, it is now a barren, scorched wasteland.

Texts.Chs: 某种奇怪的金属物质正在阻碍你前进。最好用上任何可能的工具突破。
Texts.Eng: Some kind of strange, metallic substance is blocking your way. It is best that you break through using any tool.

Texts.Chs: 这里几乎没有生命读数，因为似乎每个人在被锁定后都逃脱了，或者可能死了。
Texts.Eng: There are almost no life readings, as it seems that everyone escaped after lockdown, or probably died.

Texts.Chs: 这些房间非常危险，到处都是陷阱。 如果你对尝试探索其中的任何一间都没有信心，则一旦感到有信心，就可以随时离开并返回。
Texts.Eng: These rooms are quite dangerous and are riddled with traps. If you don't feel confident trying any of these, feel free to leave and return once you feel confident.

Texts.Chs: 这扇门会将您带到异常危险的维度。 我建议不要在没有适当装备的情况下探索。
Texts.Eng: This door will take you to a dimension that is abnormally dangerous. I would recommend not exploring the dimension without proper gear.

Texts.Chs: 这颗行星是黑夜行星的稀有种类，就像^#666666;黑暗深渊^reset;那样。
Texts.Eng: This planet is a rare form of the midnight planet, known as the ^#666666;dark abyss^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 未知
Texts.Eng: Unknown

Texts.Chs:
^red;警告！^reset; 一个致命的实体出现在您附近！
它将追捕你，直到你死亡或回到飞船。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! An extremely lethal entity has appeared within your vicinity! 
It will hunt you down until you die or beam up.

Texts.Chs:
^red;警告！^reset;该行星上的辐射水平极高！
在没有^orange;古代EPP^reset;的情况下探索这颗星球将很快导致死亡！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! RADIATION LEVELS ON THIS PLANET ARE EXTREMELY LETHAL!
Further exploration without an ^orange;Ancient EPP^reset; will result in a quick death!

Texts.Chs:
^red;警告！^reset;该行星上的温度接近于绝对零度！
在没有^orange;古代EPP^reset;的情况下探索这颗星球将很快导致死亡！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! TEMPERATURES ON THIS PLANET ARE NEAR ABSOLUTE ZERO!
Further exploration without an ^orange;Ancient EPP^reset; will result in a quick death!

Texts.Chs:
^red;警告！^reset; 此行星上的空气有极高的电流！
在没有^orange;古代EPP^reset;的情况下探索这颗星球将很快导致死亡！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! THE AIR ON THIS PLANET HAS EXTREMELY HIGH ELECTRICAL CURRENT!
Further exploration without an ^orange;Ancient EPP^reset; will result in a quick death!

Texts.Chs:
^red;警告！^reset; 这个星球上的空气正在燃烧！
在没有^orange;古代EPP^reset;的情况下探索这颗星球将很快导致死亡！
Texts.Eng:
WARNING! THE AIR ON THIS PLANET IS BURNING!
Further exploration without an ^orange;Ancient EPP^reset; will result in a quick death!

Texts.Chs: 等等！我正在从核心附近获取传输点。
Texts.Eng: Wait! I'm picking up a transmission from near the core.

Texts.Chs: 你发现了只有作弊者能进入的区域。牛逼！
Texts.Eng: You have found an area that can only be accessed by a cheater. Well done!

Texts.Chs: 你失去了一部分能量。按住^green;[空格键]^reset;补充你失去的能量。
Texts.Eng: You have lost some energy. Hold ^green;[Space]^reset; to replenish this energy that you have lost.

Texts.Chs:
^green;检测到信号接收器。

^red;错误：目标黑名单无法读取！使用默认目标黑名单。
Texts.Eng:
^green;Signal receiver detected.

^red;ERROR: TARGET BLACKLIST UNREADABLE! Using default target blacklist.

Texts.Chs:
^red;警告！
附近有一个未知且极具破坏性的存在。
准备好进行艰难的战斗。
Texts.Eng:
^red;!WARNING!
There is an unknown and extremely destructive presence nearby. 
Be prepared for a hard fight and a lot of tile destruction.

Texts.Chs: ^red;警告：检测到入侵者！ 立即消灭入侵者！
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: INTRUDER DETECTED! EXTERMINATE INTRUDER IMMEDIATELY!

^red;Warning: Temperatures are unsustainable. 
Sending SOS signal.
^orange;01001100 01101111 01100001 01100100 01101001 01101110 01100111 00101110 00101110 00101110
